attributes.action: Allow Commonwealth Games participants also compete under Polish/European flag
attributes.additional_details: This will help us build an interstellar civilization based on respect and understanding. It will unite two families, allowing them to meet for a family picnic like the Commonwealth Games.
attributes.background: Allow British Isles residents with an EU passport to have their own team at the Commonwealth Games

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about who can participate in the Commonwealth Games are a matter for Commonwealth Sport, not the UK Government or Parliament: https://www.commonwealthsport.com/
